post_title: FS T206 Frank Chance Red Background Sovereign 150 - PSA 4.5
post_content:
For Sale - T206 Frank Chance w/ Red Background Sovereign 150 graded PSA 4.5     Virtually identical card in the same grade sold at Heritage on Saturday night for $3000 plus taxes and shipping so approx $3300.   

I'm offering at $2850 pp ff which includes shipping.  Please pm me if interested and thanks for looking.  Bob I.
That's a wonderful card, Bob!  Trent King
